mapper.update: update ssq_bonus_detail set code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, type_num = #{typeNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, type_money = #{typeMoney,jdbcType=CHAR}, insert_date = #{insertDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, game_code = #{gameCode,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, code, type, type_num, type_money, insert_date, game_code from ssq_bonus_detail
